FH.Heat.Addition.desc: Heat addition to feed water heaters

Capital.Cost.desc: Approximated capital cost for heat exchanger network

Total.Cost.desc: Approximated total annualized cost for heat exchanger network

Delta.Efficiency.CCS.desc: Change of net efficiency due to CCS

Delta.Power.CCS.desc: Change of net power output due to CCS

Delta.Power.HI.desc: Change of net power output due to heat integration

Delta.Efficiency.HI.desc: Change of net efficiency due to heat integration

No.Stream.desc: Number of process streams for heat integration

FH.Heat.Addition.desc: Heat addition into feed water heaters

Reset.desc: This options will cause a simulation to be reset to after each run.

Allow Simulation Warnings.desc: Consider a simulation successful if it completes with warnings. (AspenPlus only for now)

Min Status Check Interval.desc: This is the minimum amount of time between job status checks.

Maximum Run Time (s).desc: This is the ammount of time in seconds that FOQUS should wait for results to come back from Turbine once the simulation starts running.

Initialize Model.desc: If this is ture, the simulation is run with default values to initialize it before running the  model inputs. This is often useful with Aspen Plus

Max Status Check Interval.desc: This is the maximum ammount of time between job status

Maximum Wait Time (s).desc: This is the ammount of time in seconds that FOQUS should wait for results to come back from Turbine.

Max consumer reuse.desc: Number maximum of times to reuse a Turbine consumer before forcing it to restart
